typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrderID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		OrderDate as string,
		ShipDate as string,
		TotalCost as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		OrderDetailID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		Quantity as string,
		UnitCost as string,
		LineNumber as string,
		UpdatedDate as string,
		SourceSystemID as string,
		GlobelOrderID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100) ~> Sales
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Customer
Customer filter(ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> Filter1
